title: 10 reasons why picking career over house can prove fruitful for your personal finances - Economic Times
content: 10 reasons why picking career over house can prove fruitful for your personal finances  Economic Times
description: When they tell you that moving homes is a pain, involves uncertainty, jeopardises wealth and career, think twice. It may not be as bad after all. Be flexible as far as housing is concerned and it will pay rich dividends.
